about_the_game:
You cannot survive the relentless forces of good alone. Better call allies from the Abyss!
Gather the necessary ingredients and summon them from your cauldron.

Description

Call the Abyss is a thrilling 2D survival arcade game packed with action and magic. This unique experience challenges you to push your limits while defending a dark and mysterious world. And the best part? It's completely FREE!

Game Features

  • Survival Mode: Face endless waves of enemies in frantic and strategic combat.
  • Summoning Theme: Developed in three days for Ludum Dare Jam. The theme was Summoning, so the player starts off weak, but don't worry, your summoned allies are the key to victory!
  • Allies: Gather resources and use your magical cauldron to summon powerful allies.
  • Totems: Use totems to boost your team stats while they remain alive.
  • Aim with Your Mouse: Direct all your allies' attacks by aiming with your mouse.
  • Global Leaderboards: Climb to the top of the leaderboard and leave your mark on history.
  • Hand Drawn Style: Enjoy the dark fantasy style with meticulously crafted graphics.
  • 100% Free: Yes, we know, some just do it for the fun.

Combat Styles

Choose your preferred survival style and adjust your strategy to dominate the battlefield.

-------------------------------------------- Melee --------------------------------------------



------------------------------------------- Ranged -------------------------------------------



--------------------------------------------- Elite ---------------------------------------------



-------------------------------------------- Totem --------------------------------------------



Download now and dive into the abyss... if you dare!
